dublin_core.dcvalue: Stuart Campo, UNICEF Innovation Development Specialist, UNICEF, Email: scampo@unicef.org; James Powell, U-Report Global Coordinator & Strategist, UNICEF, Email: jpowell@unicef.org

U-Report is a text-based youth engagement tool with real-time data analysis that uses community communication to identify health needs, raise awareness, identify health sector gaps, and establish a strong long-term system post-emergency.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:24Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 u-report-fighting_diseases_across_borders.pdf: 182159 bytes, checksum: f4b48227d5b675344d6f07ff86df35be (MD5)
Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Child health, Infectious diseases
